author: Liz Alesse
title: As states crack down on gatherings, some religious exemptions could keep pews full
description: Some states have not barred churches from gathering despite COVID-19.
content: Despite repeated warnings from health experts about the risk of social interaction over novel coronavirus, governors in at least three states have exempted houses of worship from statewide bans on mass gatherings, and this weekend will offer a first test to s… [+6433 chars]
